RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST KITTEN away alertly, set all the pace off the rail and lasted under strong handling. WILLYMAR veered in at the seven sixteenths pole causing the rider of GRAN MAMIBELLA to checked, rallied along the inside into the stretch, altered course outside the winner near the furlong marker and was steadily cutting into the one's advantage late. GRAN MAMIBELLA was shut off by the runner up at the seven sixteenths pole causing her rider to checked, stopped back into the turn then came on again late. TARA DAWN passed tiring rivals inside. TOY TIGER had good early speed then faded. PRINCESS CONSUELA failed to menace. SHE MAKES ME TIZZY reared at the start and was outrun. SABELLE chased the winner through the turn then stopped. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF WILLYMAR LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH, ALSO THE RIDER OF GRAN MAMIBELL LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF WILLYMAR FOR INTERFERENCE ON THE BACKSTRETCH. AFER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: First Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace off rail, lasted, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: shut off 7/16pole, dropped back, came again, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Willymar
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in 7/16pole, inside bid, altered out 1/8pole, claimed foul

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWING STATE allowed to settle, closed rapidly three wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew off to win as much the best. HARSH TRUTH slow early, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack through the stretch while closing determinedly and got up for second. LOTSA MATCHA also slow early, found his best stride through deep stretch while also drifting out to the middle of the racetrack. CONSTITUTION COAL rushed to be forwardly placed, improved position on the turn then came up empty. RAY'S EMPIRE failed to menace. BAD BOY BOOGIE sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace to the top of the stretch then stopped abruptly. COUNCIL OF FOUR chased the pace into the turn, drifted out in the stretch and also stopped. TIER ONE lost his jockey near the five furlong marker due to him losing his left iron. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Boy Boogie
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace upper stretch, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Swing State
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, closed fast, 3 wide, drew off, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Smokin C LLC & Super Saver Syndicate

ENTRY.NAME: Council of Four
ENTRY.OWNER: Aurora Racing Sheppell Peter J and Royer Family Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Lotsa Matcha
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, late rally, drifted mid track, good try

ENTRY.NAME: Harsh Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, drifted stretch, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 19 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELY LISA away alertly, set a pressured pace through the turn then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while being ridden out. FRACING NASTY pressured the winner into the stretch then was no match but held on for second. LOVE'S TAVITO never far back, finished with good courage four wide. ALSANAH trailed early then closed a gap late two wide. WILDCAT DREAM unhurried early, improved position in the five path into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. MY DANCING QUEEN vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch and faded late. SCARRAZANO had good early speed then faded. AYY LADIES moved up three wide on the turn then came up empty. LELAWALA had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: My Dancing Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, drew off, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Love's Tavito
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 4 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 19 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOMUCHSUGAR pressed the pace along the inside, matched strides the length of the stretch and proved best by a narrow margin in a game effort. THE DEVIL'S DREAM away alertly, set a pressured pace into the stretch, dug in determinedly but couldn't handle the winner. CAUSE OF LOVE vied for the lead into the stretch then faded. NICEASAKITTENSEYES had brief speed. I GOT HOPE drifted out at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Somuchsugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, long drive, proved best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sheltowee Farm, Michael E. Evans II & Travis A. Evans

ENTRY.NAME: The Devil's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2 wide, long drive, just failed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOTTAGETITBACK sped to to the lead soon after the start four wide, set the balance of the pace under pressured two wide and prevailed under strong handling. EXONERATED PREZ pressed the pace along the rail and just missed in a game effort. JULIE'S FERRARI vied for the lead three wide and went evenly. HEY SACH had speed from the start, improved along the inside through the turn, shifted out to the six path giving up ground then came on again late. TURN THE SWITCH failed to menace. REINSURE was no factor. AIRWAR was no threat. QIAN B C was outrun. JOCULARITY had speed through the turn then weakened. RAKU FIRING was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Gottagetitback
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, 4 wide, set pressured pace 2 wide, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Exonerated Prez
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, just missed, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Sach
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, altered course 6path, lost ground,came again

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEYOND MY DREAMS unhurried early, closed willingly four wide into the stretch under left handed urging and drew clear. MY BROTHER CAM away alertly, set the pace for six furlongs, drifted out late bumping NATES HEARTTHROB and held on for second. NATES HEARTTHROB unhurried early, rallied three wide into the stretch, was bumped late just missed getting up for second. BIG FRANK settled mid pack, offered a bid along the inside on the far turn then was outfinished. STRIKE A BEAT moved up three wide on the far turn then leveled off. BOURBON DELIGHT chased the pace from the four path and was through after a half. THEDUKE OF HAZZARD was never close. CRY MACHO close up early, was through after a half and flattened out. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF NATES HEARTTHROB LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF MY BROTHER CAM FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED MY BROTHER CAM AND PLACED HIM THIRD.

ENTRY.NAME: Nates Heartthrob
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied 3 wide, bumped late, jockey claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Big Frank
ENTRY.OWNER: Lady Smith Stable LLC and Sayban Don

ENTRY.NAME: Cry Macho
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond My Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly 4 wide, left urging, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: dq-My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 6furs, drifted late, bumped, held place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 19. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACT LIKE A LADY never far back, closed willingly three wide through the turn and into the stretch, made the lead late under left handed urging and drew off under a strong hand ride. FANCY EMPRESS trailed into the stretch, closed with a burst of speed in the six path and finished clear for second. LA MUNECA sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. FLOWZANO failed to menace. COOL IRIS stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. READY TO PLAY chased the pace from the four path and was through after a half. UNTAPPED ENERGY pulled up injured on the turn and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Untapped Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled up injured turn, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: La Muneca
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace late stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Act Like a Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 3 wide, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 19. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY never far back, rallied three then two wide between horses under left handed urging and was along in time. FLYING BUSINESS stalked the pace along the inside, surged late along the rail but finished second best. CHARGAREE close up from the start, finished determinedly five wide. ROSE RING unhurried early, swung wide and closed a gap late in the middle of the racetrack. PAO DE QUEIJO stalked the pace into the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead in upper stretch then was outfinished. LEADING INDICATOR trailed into the stretch and found her best stride late along the inside. ROMANTIC JEWEL pressed the pace along the inside then two wide into the stretch, was in tight between rivals at the furlong marker, checked, angled out to the five path and lost momentum. CATLIKE had brief speed. LIL' SISTER LOU broke in front, set a pressured pace two wide into the tune then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, surged late rail, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, checked 2w, 1/8pole, lost momentum

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3-2wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, closed gap late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Lil' Sister Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Pao de Queijo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3w, led late, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Chargaree
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rallied late 5 wide, good effort,
